bug.author: BUgxCreator
bug.summary: question about "hyp adjust" when resuming training
bug.description: after training my custom dataset, I have a question. Does resuming simply just resume the weights or as well as the hyp? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48846150/66729649-583a8c00-ee7f-11e9-8cdf-106b0ae68598.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Resume resumes the weights and the optimizer gradients. hyps are initialized the same way whether or not --resume is used. --resume is exactly the same as --weights weights/last.pt
